mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, e.email, e.pwd, e.name, e.intl_no, e.phone, e.sign, e.join_date, d.dept_no, d.dept_name, j.job_title_no, j.job_title, j.job_level FROM TB_EMPLOYEE e JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT d on e.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN TB_COMPANY c on d.cp_no = c.cp_no JOIN TB_JOB_TITLE j on j.job_title_no = e.job_title_no where resign_yn = 'N' and c.cp_no = #{cp_no} order by job_level desc, name
